message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40.  It's better to secure a good amount now than risk losing out to inflation.

Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll take a little less, you take a little more, but we need to close this deal before inflation eats away at the value. 55-45, final offer.
